title: Wisdom of Nature
content:
Reimagining Western Civilization that respects the wisdom of Nature Kenny Ausubel is the founder and Co-CEO of... <!--more--> Bioneers, a network of visionary scholars, scientists and social leaders dedicated to understanding how nature and living systems operate to find sustainable solutions to support human life while living in harmony with Nature.
He is an award-winning journalist, author and filmmaker who has pioneered ideas in preserving biodiversity, organic farming and food production and alternative medicine.
He is the co-founder ofSeeds of Change, an organic seed company and his documentary film “Hoxsey: When Healing Becomes a Crime” influenced national policy on alternative medicine.
His most recent book is “Dreaming the Future: Reimagining Civilization in the Age of Nature.”
